title: [Large-scale] Mixed Reality Simulation-Based Educational Competency Enhancement Program for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of basic educational theories and classroom management methods
context.additional_context: Program training preservice teachers' classroom management and student supervision skills via mixed reality simulations reflecting actual classroom environments.

learning_goals: Educators can apply appropriate intervention strategies to student avatars exhibiting challenging behaviors in a mixed-reality simulation environment.
Educators can utilize professional communication skills when interacting with student avatars on disability-related sensitive topics.
Learners can propose at least three situational response strategies that may occur in real educational settings based on simulation experiences.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
